TopicTitle: How do I find the source of Kracken Drive?

Articles.Content:
This ship has some sort of kracken drive affect. which is extremely problematic when trying to dock with stuff, since it's an orbital tug/junk collector, it tries to intercept stuff a lot.

it doesn't have any landing gear, or docking ports facing each other, a little bit of part clipping, but not a lot.
what does "kraken drive effecct" mean exactly? does it launch at the speed of light out of the solar system or what?
